last_episode_to_air.name: Going Back to Cali
last_episode_to_air.overview: David and Peña are in a race against each other to find Pallomari. Peña makes a serious decision about the future of his career.

name: Narcos
overview: A gritty chronicle of the war against Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Season one chronicles the rise of drug lord Pablo Escobar, the ruthless boss of the Medellin Cartel and a known terrorist who was also a congressman, a family man and revered by the poor as a new Robin Hood.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two continues the story of drug lord Pablo Escobar, the ruthless boss of the Medellin Cartel, including his incarceration in a prison he himself builds and his subsequent fall from power.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Season three shifts its focus to Pablo Escobar’s real-life successors in the drug trade: Colombia’s Cali Cartel, "the biggest drug lords you’ve probably never heard of."

tagline: There's no business like blow business.

episodes.name: Descenso
episodes.overview: Chilean drug chemist Cockroach brings his product to Colombian smuggler Pablo Escobar. DEA agent Steve Murphy joins the war on drugs in Bogota.

episodes.name: The Sword of Simón Bolívar
episodes.overview: Communist radical group M-19 makes a move against the narcos, while Murphy gets an education in Colombian law enforcement from his new partner Peña.

episodes.name: The Men of Always
episodes.overview: Murphy encounters the depths of government corruption when he and Peña try to derail Escobar's political ambitions by proving he's a narco.

episodes.name: The Palace in Flames
episodes.overview: Despite a new extradition treaty, the U.S. puts more money into fighting communism, creating new challenges for Murphy and Peña in the hunt for Pablo.

episodes.name: There Will Be a Future
episodes.overview: Pablo's extreme methods put the narcos on the brink of war with Carillo and  the government. Peña tries to protect his witness, Elisa.

episodes.name: Explosivos
episodes.overview: Peña and Carillo close in on Gacha, while Murphy tries to protect pro-extradition candidate Gaviria from a notorious assassin connected to Pablo.

episodes.name: You Will Cry Tears of Blood
episodes.overview: Pablo goes into hiding as the political tide turns against him, but he finds a way to strike back. Murphy and Peña finally get the CIA to help them.

episodes.name: La Gran Mentira
episodes.overview: A tragic mistake forces the government to change tactics in the fight against Pablo. But Pablo faces bigger threats from inside his empire.

episodes.name: La Catedral
episodes.overview: The hunt for Pablo seems to be over after he makes a deal with the government, but Murphy and Peña -- and the Cali Cartel -- have other plans.

episodes.name: Despegue
episodes.overview: Pablo's activities in prison provoke the government into taking extreme action. Murphy and Peña face a situation of their own.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Season one chronicles the rise of drug lord Pablo Escobar, the ruthless boss of the Medellin Cartel and a known terrorist who was also a congressman, a family man and revered by the poor as a new Robin Hood.

episodes.name: Free at Last
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of a massive military effort to take Pablo into custody, the family reunites while enemies worry. Steve and Connie fight about safety.

episodes.name: Cambalache
episodes.overview: Tata gets impatient with life on the run. Pablo responds to President Gaviria's reward offer. Steve and Javier meet their new boss.

episodes.name: Our Man in Madrid
episodes.overview: President Gaviria has a new job for an old colleague. The Search Bloc's new tactics shake up Pablo, but also unsettle Steve and Javier.

episodes.name: The Good, The Bad, and The Dead
episodes.overview: The Cali cartel discusses moving in on Pablo's territory. Limón proposes a plan to Maritza. Tata gets a gun for protection.

episodes.name: The Enemies of My Enemy
episodes.overview: The Search Bloc gets a new leader. Javier loses faith in the system. Pablo brings Tata's brother Carlos down from Miami to cheer her up.

episodes.name: Los Pepes
episodes.overview: The newly-formed Los Pepes want to destroy Pablo and his empire. Tata's brother urges her to leave and seek safety with her children.

episodes.name: Deutschland 93
episodes.overview: As the danger intensifies for the Escobars, Pablo sends his family to another country. Gaviria weighs the opportunity to use them as leverage.

episodes.name: Exit El Patrón
episodes.overview: Colombia begins to turn on Escobar after his latest terrorist attack. Tata receives help from an unlikely ally. Quica gets increasingly anxious.

episodes.name: Nuestra Finca
episodes.overview: Pablo is reunited with an estranged family member. Judy Moncada's life is put in danger. The DEA and CIA clash over how to handle Los Pepes.

episodes.name: Al Fin Cayó!
episodes.overview: Javier deals with the repercussions from Judy's interview. Tata tries to convince Pablo to surrender for the sake of his children.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two continues the story of drug lord Pablo Escobar, the ruthless boss of the Medellin Cartel, including his incarceration in a prison he himself builds and his subsequent fall from power.

episodes.name: The Kingpin Strategy
episodes.overview: The Gentlemen of Cali gather their associates together for a big surprise announcement about the future of their business.

episodes.name: The Cali KGB
episodes.overview: A gas incident threatens to disrupt the Cali-government deal and Jorge is asked to help out. Peña grapples with his former Los Pepes connection.

episodes.name: Follow the Money
episodes.overview: The Rodriguez brothers go into hiding during negotiations. Pacho meets with the Lord of the Skies in Mexico. Peña's new DEA team visits Cali.

episodes.name: Checkmate
episodes.overview: Peña hatches a plan to try to capture Cali leader Gilberto Rodriguez. Amado proposes a business idea to Pacho.

episodes.name: MRO
episodes.overview: Paranoid about leaks, Miguel cracks down on his security. Pacho makes a decision about his new offer. Peña works on cultivating a witness.

episodes.name: Best Laid Plans
episodes.overview: Jorge takes a dangerous risk. An accident in New York threatens to expose Chepe. Peña travels to Curaçao to arrest a potential witness.

episodes.name: Sin Salida
episodes.overview: Peña plans another covert operation to take down a key Cali cartel member, but he risks running out of time during his search.

episodes.name: Convivir
episodes.overview: David seeks revenge on behalf of his father, putting Enrique in danger. Peña asks Don Berna for help on a rescue mission.

episodes.name: Todos Los Hombres del Presidente
episodes.overview: David follows his suspicions. Peña is shocked to discover the depth of corruption in the Colombian government. Miguel is sought after once again.

episodes.name: Going Back to Cali
episodes.overview: David and Peña are in a race against each other to find Pallomari. Peña makes a serious decision about the future of his career.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Season three shifts its focus to Pablo Escobar’s real-life successors in the drug trade: Colombia’s Cali Cartel, "the biggest drug lords you’ve probably never heard of."
